People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 加强涉外法制建设 营造有利法治条件和外部环境http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_1-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

;■Strengthening the construction of foreign-related legal systems is not only a long-term need to comprehensively promote the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation through Chinese-style modernization, but also promotes the great cause of national rejuvenation. It is imperative to open up to the outside world at a high level and respond to external risks and challenges. From the perspective of better coordinating the domestic and international situations, and better coordinating development and security, we must deeply understand the importance and urgency of doing a good job in foreign-related legal work, and build a foreign-related legal system that is consistent with the requirements of high-quality development and high-level opening up. and capabilities to create favorable legal conditions and external environment for the steady and long-term development of Chinese-style modernization

;

;■Law is the yardstick for social life and national governance. The foreign-related legal system is an important part of the national legal system and the foundation of foreign-related legal rule. It plays an important role in consolidating fundamentals, stabilizing expectations, and benefiting the long-term. On the new journey of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation, we must adhere to the correct political direction and accelerate the construction of our country’s foreign-related legal system and capacity with a more active historical responsibility and creative spirit

;

;■ Foreign-related legal system as socialism with Chinese characteristics It is an important part of the rule of law system and is related to the comprehensive rule of law and the overall situation of my country's opening up and diplomatic work. The fundamental purpose of promoting foreign-related legal work is to use the rule of law to better safeguard the interests of the country and the people, promote the progress of the international rule of law, and promote the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind. We must unswervingly follow the path of socialist rule of law with Chinese characteristics

;

;■Foreign-related legal work is a systematic project involving a wide range of areas and strong linkage. We must coordinate domestic and international development and security, and adhere to a forward-looking approach. Thinking, overall planning, strategic layout, and overall promotion, strengthen top-level design, promote foreign-related legislation, law enforcement, justice, law compliance and legal services in an integrated manner, and form a large coordinated pattern of foreign-related legal work

;

;■We must firmly maintain The international order is based on international law, actively participates in the formulation of international rules, and promotes the rule of law in international relations. Actively participate in the reform and construction of the global governance system, promote the development of global governance in a more fair and reasonable direction, promote good global governance with international good laws, and help build a community with a shared future for mankind

;

;■The rule of law goes hand in hand with opening up, and opening up to the outside world To move forward one step further, the construction of foreign-related rule of law must follow suit. We must persist in promoting high-level opening up to the outside world on the basis of the rule of law, promote the construction of foreign-related rule of law in expanding opening-up, and continuously consolidate the rule of law foundation for high-level opening up. The rule of law is the best business environment. It is necessary to improve the open and transparent foreign-related legal system, strengthen the protection of intellectual property rights, safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of foreign-invested enterprises, make good use of both domestic and international rules, and create a market-oriented, legal and international first-class business environment. . It is necessary to proactively connect and actively absorb high-standard international economic and trade rules, steadily expand institutional opening up, improve the level of trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, and build a new higher-level open economic system. It is necessary to benchmark the international advanced level, timely upgrade the effective measures and mature experience of high-level opening-up such as free trade pilot zones into laws, and create a new highland for opening-up with a higher level of opening-up, a better business environment, and a stronger radiating effect. It is necessary to comprehensively improve the ability to maintain open security in accordance with the law. Improve measures to facilitate foreigners’ living in China and relevant laws and regulations

;

;■ It is necessary to strengthen professional talent training and team building. Adhere to cultivating people with moral integrity and studying both morality and law, strengthen discipline construction, provide legal education well, improve practice-oriented training mechanisms, and cultivate a group of people with firm political stances, excellent professional qualities, familiar with international rules, and proficient in foreign-related legal practices at an early date Talents for foreign-related rule of law

;

;■ must strengthen their confidence in the rule of law, actively interpret the concepts, propositions and successful practices of foreign-related rule of law with Chinese characteristics, and tell the story of China’s rule of law in the new era. Strengthen research on cutting-edge topics in the theory and practice of foreign-related rule of law, build a theoretical system and discourse system of foreign-related rule of law with Chinese characteristics and integrate China and foreign countries, and demonstrate my country's image as a great country governed by the rule of law and a civilized country. The Chinese legal system has a long history, and China’s excellent traditional legal culture contains rich legal thoughts and profound political wisdom, and is a treasure of Chinese culture. It is necessary to actively promote the creative transformation and innovative development of China's excellent traditional legal culture, give China's legal civilization a new era connotation, and stimulate vigorous vitality

;

;

;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 28   The Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee held its tenth collective study session on the afternoon of November 27 on strengthening the construction of foreign-related legal systems. When presiding over the study, Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, emphasized that strengthening the construction of foreign-related legal systems is not only a long-term need to comprehensively promote the construction of a strong country and national rejuvenation through Chinese-style modernization, but also an urgent task to promote high-level opening up to the outside world and respond to external risks and challenges. From the perspective of better coordinating the domestic and international situations, and better coordinating development and security, we must deeply understand the importance and urgency of doing a good job in foreign-related legal work, and build a foreign-related legal system that is consistent with the requirements of high-quality development and high-level opening up. and capabilities to create favorable legal conditions and external environment for the steady and long-term development of Chinese-style modernization.

;

;Comrade Huang Huikang, Distinguished Professor of Wuhan University, explained this issue and put forward work suggestions. Comrades from the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee listened carefully to the explanation and held discussions.

;

;Xi Jinping delivered an important speech after listening to the explanation and discussion. He pointed out that law is the criterion for social life and national governance. The foreign-related legal system is an important part of the national legal system and the foundation of foreign-related legal rule. It plays an important role in consolidating fundamentals, stabilizing expectations, and benefiting the long-term. On the new journey of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation, we must adhere to the correct political direction and accelerate the construction of our country's foreign-related legal system and capabilities with a more active historical responsibility and creative spirit.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that the rule of law involving foreign affairs, as an important part of the socialist legal system with Chinese characteristics, is related to the comprehensive governance of the country according to law, and is related to the overall situation of my country's opening to the outside world and diplomatic work. The fundamental purpose of promoting foreign-related legal work is to use the rule of law to better safeguard the interests of the country and the people, promote the progress of the international rule of law, and promote the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind. We must unswervingly follow the path of socialist rule of law with Chinese characteristics.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that foreign-related legal work is a systematic project with wide coverage and strong linkage. It must coordinate domestic and international affairs, coordinate development and security, and adhere to forward-looking thinking, overall planning, and strategic layout. , promote overall development, strengthen top-level design, promote foreign-related legislation, law enforcement, judiciary, law-abiding and legal services in an integrated manner, and form a coordinated pattern of foreign-related legal work. It is necessary to adhere to legislation first and implement reforms, repeals, and interpretations simultaneously to form a systematic and complete system of foreign-related laws and regulations. It is necessary to build a coordinated and efficient foreign-related legal enforcement system, improve the judicial efficiency of foreign-related law enforcement, promote the reform of foreign-related judicial trial systems and mechanisms, and improve the credibility of foreign-related justice. It is necessary to actively develop foreign-related legal services and cultivate a number of world-class arbitration institutions and law firms. It is necessary to deepen international cooperation in law enforcement and justice, strengthen consular protection and assistance, and build a strong legal security chain to protect my country's overseas interests. It is necessary to strengthen compliance awareness, guide our citizens and enterprises to consciously abide by local laws, regulations and customs in the process of "going global", and use the rule of law and rules to safeguard their legitimate rights and interests.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized the need to firmly safeguard the international order based on international law, actively participate in the formulation of international rules, and promote the rule of law in international relations. Actively participate in the reform and construction of the global governance system, promote global governance in a more fair and reasonable direction, promote good global governance with good international law, and help build a community with a shared future for mankind.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that the rule of law goes hand in hand with opening up. As opening up to the outside world moves forward, the construction of foreign-related rule of law must follow suit. We must persist in promoting high-level opening up to the outside world on the basis of the rule of law, promote the construction of foreign-related rule of law in expanding opening-up, and continuously consolidate the rule of law foundation for high-level opening up. The rule of law is the best business environment. It is necessary to improve the open and transparent foreign-related legal system, strengthen the protection of intellectual property rights, safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of foreign-invested enterprises, make good use of both domestic and international rules, and create a market-oriented, legal and international first-class business environment. . It is necessary to proactively connect and actively absorb high-standard international economic and trade rules, steadily expand institutional opening up, improve the level of trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, and build a new higher-level open economic system. It is necessary to benchmark the international advanced level, timely upgrade the effective measures and mature experience of high-level opening-up such as free trade pilot zones into laws, and create a new highland for opening-up with a higher level of opening-up, a better business environment, and a stronger radiating effect. It is necessary to comprehensively improve the ability to maintain open security in accordance with the law. Improve service measures and relevant laws and regulations to facilitate foreigners living in China.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized the need to strengthen professional talent training and team building. Adhere to cultivating people with moral integrity and studying both morality and law, strengthen discipline construction, provide legal education well, improve practice-oriented training mechanisms, and cultivate a group of people with firm political stances, excellent professional qualities, familiar with international rules, and proficient in foreign-related legal practices at an early date of foreign-related legal talents. Improve the talent introduction, selection, use, and management mechanisms, and prepare high-end foreign-related legal talent training reserves. Strengthen the construction of the legal capacity of foreign-related cadres and create a high-quality and professional foreign-related legal team. Leading cadres at all levels must take the lead in respecting, studying, abiding by, and using the law, and effectively improve their thinking on foreign-related legal affairs and their ability to act in accordance with the law.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that we must strengthen our confidence in the rule of law, actively interpret the concepts, propositions and successful practices of foreign-related rule of law with Chinese characteristics, and tell the story of China’s rule of law in the new era. Strengthen research on cutting-edge topics in the theory and practice of foreign-related rule of law, build a theoretical system and discourse system of foreign-related rule of law with Chinese characteristics and integrate China and foreign countries, and demonstrate my country's image as a great country governed by the rule of law and a civilized country. The Chinese legal system has a long history, and China’s excellent traditional legal culture contains rich legal thoughts and profound political wisdom, and is a treasure of Chinese culture. It is necessary to actively promote the creative transformation and innovative development of China's excellent traditional legal culture, give China's legal civilization a new era connotation, and stimulate vigorous vitality.

; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 01版要闻 - 前10月社会物流总额同比增长4.9%（新数据 新看点）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_2-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

;Our newspaper, Beijing, November 28th  (Reporter Du Haitao) A reporter from China Logistics and The Purchasing Federation learned that: from January to October, the total social logistics volume nationwide was 278.3 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 4.9% based on comparable prices, and the growth rate was 0.1 percentage points higher than that from January to September; in October, the year-on-year increase was 5.1%, and the month-on-month growth rate was 5.1%. increased by 0.3 percentage points.

;

;In October, the growth rate of total social logistics stabilized and rebounded. The production and circulation situation of most upstream industries was good, and the structured upgrading of logistics demand continued to advance. Logistics activities generally maintain a relatively high prosperity range, and market expectations are rising steadily.

;

;Industrial logistics is generally stable and the structure is further consolidated. From January to October, the total volume of industrial product logistics maintained steady growth, with a year-on-year growth of 4.1%. The growth rate was 0.1 percentage points higher than that from January to September. In October, the year-on-year growth rate was 4.6%. From the perspective of industry segments, more than 70% of the industry's total logistics volume has increased, and the growth area has further expanded compared with September.

;

;The effectiveness of the policy gradually emerged, and import logistics continued to improve. From January to October, the total import logistics volume increased by 13.5% year-on-year, and in October it increased by 12.3% year-on-year, still maintaining a relatively high growth rate.

;

;New business formats and new kinetic energy logistics develop collaboratively and play a driving role. From January to October, the national online retail sales of physical goods increased by 8.4% year-on-year, accounting for an increase of 0.3 percentage points in the total retail sales of consumer goods. Driven by new business formats, the logistics demand for related smart consumer goods has expanded simultaneously, driving the logistics demand for smart vehicle equipment manufacturing and smart unmanned aerial vehicle manufacturing to grow by more than 50%.

;; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 01版要闻 - 贵州奋力在乡村振兴上开新局（高质量发展调研行）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_3-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

;Deep in Miaoling, industrial bases are in full swing, and newly harvested agricultural products are about to be shipped to various places; Qianbei Plateau , tea mountains are rolling up and down, and laughter and laughter can be heard from time to time in the traditional houses with green tiles and white walls... Walking in the villages of Guizhou, scenes of harvest scenes unfold before your eyes.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "Achieving a moderately prosperous society is not the end, but a new starting point. We must also consolidate the results of poverty alleviation, continue to promote rural revitalization, and proceed in a down-to-earth manner in accordance with the established goals to develop the industry well. , build the countryside better and create a more colorful life."

;

;Throughout the implementation of the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important speech, Guizhou has effectively consolidated and expanded the results of poverty alleviation and effectively connected various projects with rural revitalization. work, accelerate the construction of a livable, industrial and beautiful countryside, and strive to open a new chapter in rural revitalization.

;

;;The industry is booming and the money bags are getting bigger and bigger;

;

;In the early morning, the mist has not cleared, and the Chejiang Dam is gradually unveiled in the mist . Shi Zhen, a villager in Yuezhai Village, went out early to transplant a new crop of vegetable seedlings with members of the vegetable planting cooperative.

;

;Yuezhai Village is located in Guzhou Town, Rongjiang County, Qiandongnan Miao and Dong Autonomous Prefecture. In front of Shi Zhen's home is a 10,000-acre dam area. In Guizhou, where there are no plains, this is really rare.

;

;"In the past, the land was uneven, and everyone cultivated it, and the harvest was only enough to support the family. Now the land is flat, large-scale planting, vegetables and grains are grown all year round, and the income per mu exceeds 15,000 yuan." Shi Zhen pointed to the flat land. A good vegetable base of more than 300 acres is said.

;

;In 2020, Rongjiang County will build high-standard farmland in the Chejiang Dam area to guide large-scale characteristic planting. Today, the dam area has attracted 25 business entities to settle in. In the first three quarters of this year, 30,400 tons of agricultural products were harvested, with an output value of hundreds of millions of yuan.

;

;More than 200 kilometers away from the Chejiang Dam, in a food production workshop in Huishui County, Qiannan Buyi and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, the golden prickly pear fruits are screened, cleaned, pressed, sterilized, filled, and turned into A best-selling drink. But just a few years ago, this prickly, sour wild fruit was once unpopular.

;

;“We organized a team to develop various prickly pear products that meet market demand. This year’s sales exceeded 1 billion yuan.” Ye Jizeng, chairman of Guizhou Wanglaoji Ciningji Industrial Development Co., Ltd., introduced that in 2018, through As part of the east-west collaboration mechanism, Wanglaoji Company of GPHL has established a production and R&D base in Huishui County to cultivate and expand the prickly pear industry.

;

;Today, the prickly pear industry has become an important support for Guizhou to consolidate its achievements in poverty alleviation and promote rural revitalization. As of the end of 2022, 2.1 million acres of prickly pears have been planted in the province, achieving an annual output value of 15 billion yuan, driving an increase in the income of more than 210,000 people, and an average household income increase of more than 8,000 yuan.

;

;The planting area of ​​prickly pears, peppers, blueberries, and plums ranks among the top in the country. There are 1,200 key leading enterprises in agricultural industrialization at or above the provincial level. 10 national modern agricultural industrial parks, 6 industrial clusters, and agricultural Six modernization demonstration zones... Developing specialty industries on a large scale and promoting the integrated development of primary, secondary and tertiary industries have become a key move for Guizhou to promote farmers to continue to increase their income and become rich.

;

; ;The countryside is harmonious, with good looks and temperament;

;

;Walking into Longfeng Village, Xinglong Town, Meitan County, Zunyi City, you can see the green tea gardens on the mountains and the green tea gardens at the foot of the mountains. The lotus pond is sparkling, and the houses in northern Guizhou with blue tiles and white walls are nestled among the green mountains and beautiful waters, contrasting with the rice fields, cooking smoke and distant mountains.

;

;In the square of Longfeng Village, Qi Chenglie, an old man in his seventies, sang a lantern show for tourists. The lyrics are composed by the villagers' words and my words. They revolve around life scenes such as eating, dressing, and housing, and vividly reflect the tremendous changes in the countryside.

;

;In recent years, Longfeng Village has led the construction of beautiful countryside, systematically renovated rural housing, water, electricity, roads, kitchens, and toilets, built artificial wetlands, built hardened roads, renovated ancient houses, and built covered bridges. Waterside pavilions... used to be poor ravines, but now they are at the forefront of rural revitalization.

;

;In Guizhou, more and more villages and courtyards are becoming beautiful. In recent years, Guizhou has implemented a project to renovate and improve the beautiful rural living environment, achieving full coverage of garbage collection, transportation and disposal in administrative villages, and completed the construction or renovation of 220,000 rural toilets.

;

;To build a harmonious and beautiful countryside, Guizhou improves both appearance and temperament.

;

;Since March this year, basketball games have been held continuously in Taipan Village, Taipan Township, Taijiang County, Qiandongnan Miao and Dong Autonomous Prefecture. From village competitions to provincial leagues to the national finals, this small mountain village with a population of just over a thousand has amazed the entire network and become popular.

;

;Taipan Village became popular because of the country basketball competition. Behind it is the fusion of sports spirit and folk customs. "There is no need for sponsorship or admission. What we pursue is a pure love." Cen Jianglong, director of the Taipan Village Committee, said that the basketball game in the village has been booming for more than 80 years, satisfying the spiritual and cultural life of the villagers and promoting Construction of rural spiritual civilization.

;

; ; Party building leads the way and we work together to seek development;

;

;In Dishuiyan Village, Yiduo Street, Shuicheng District, Liupanshui City, the extended country road connects water parks, camping The base and boutique B&B are connected in series, making people forget to leave.

;

;Since 2021, Shuicheng District has classified 179 villages (communities) in the district based on the endowment of rural characteristic resources, and has led the exploration and construction of industrial, industrial and mining, cultural and tourism-based, and cultural tourism-based villages in 45 demonstration villages. Ecological and health-care "five-type" village residence. Among them, Dishuiyan Village plans to build a cultural tourism village.

;

;What exactly is a cultural tourism village residence? The Party branch of Dishuiyan Village invited party members, foreign public officials, college students, etc. to provide suggestions and draw up a blueprint for the industrial development of "one scene and five areas" with the waterfall scenic spot as the core and supporting planting, amusement, B&B, breeding, food, etc. "Only when the cadres and the masses work together as one can we build the village well and develop the cultural tourism industry." said Xiao Kaitai, secretary of the Party branch of Dishuiyan Village and director of the village committee.

;

;In January this year, Guizhou formulated and issued the "Guiding Opinions on Promoting High-Quality Development of Grassroots Party Building", proposing to focus on party building to promote rural revitalization and in-depth implementation of the "Thousands of Townships Striving for Creation and Tens of Thousands of Villages Upgrading" demonstration creation , to accelerate the modernization of agriculture and rural areas.

;

;Boyanglin Street, Qixingguan District, Bijie City, is the largest single relocation site for poverty alleviation in Guizhou. In order to allow the relocated people to live and work in peace and contentment, the streets have gradually explored a grassroots social governance system that is different from rural areas and cities. “We divided the 148 buildings into 29 grids so that people can move around and things can be done within the grids,” said Chen Xiaodong, secretary of the Party Working Committee of Baiyanglin Street.

;

;In addition, Guizhou has dispatched more than 10,000 village-based first secretaries this year to achieve poverty alleviation villages, relocation communities (villages) for poverty alleviation, villages with heavy rural revitalization tasks, and villages with weak and lax party organizations. The first secretary and working team members stationed in villages are all covered, and we continue to promote the effective connection between consolidating the results of poverty alleviation and rural revitalization.

;

;(Our reporters Ge Shen, He Yuche, Su Bin, and Chen Junyi participated in the reporting)

;; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 01版要闻 - 李强出席首届中国国际供应链促进博览会开幕式暨全球供应链创新发展论坛并发表主旨演讲http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_4-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On November 28, Premier Li Qiang of the State Council in Beijing Attended the opening ceremony of the first China International Supply Chain Promotion Expo and Global Supply Chain Innovation and Development Forum, and delivered a keynote speech.
;Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Bin

;
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 28th  ; (Reporters Zou Wei, Cheng Xin) Premier Li Qiang of the State Council attended the opening ceremony of the first China International Supply Chain Promotion Expo and Global Supply Chain Innovation and Development Forum in Beijing on November 28, and delivered a keynote speech.

;

;Li Qiang said that the China International Supply Chain Promotion Expo is the world's first national-level exhibition with the theme of supply chain. The current world economic recovery is difficult. As President Xi Jinping pointed out, maintaining the resilience and stability of global industrial and supply chains is an important guarantee for promoting world economic development. Consolidating and strengthening cooperation in global industrial and supply chains is the interest and urgent expectation of all parties. China holds the Chain Expo in order to comply with the call of the times and create an international platform that promotes all parties to strengthen communication, deepen cooperation, and seek common development.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out that history and reality have proven that when global industrial chain and supply chain cooperation remains stable and continues to deepen, countries around the world will generally benefit; when global industrial and supply chain cooperation is hindered and stagnant, , countries around the world are generally suffering. China is not only a participant and beneficiary of global industrial and supply chain cooperation, but also a staunch defender and builder. China is willing to work with all parties to make the global industrial and supply chains more resilient, efficient and dynamic, and make greater contributions to promoting world economic recovery and global development and prosperity.

;

;Li Qiang put forward four initiatives on deepening international cooperation in industrial and supply chains: First, jointly build a safe and stable industrial and supply chain. Strengthen the coordination of resources in key industrial chains on a global scale and refrain from interfering in market behavior at will. China will continue to provide the world with high-quality Chinese products and stable Chinese supplies. The second is to jointly build a smooth and efficient industrial and supply chain. Further strengthen global interconnection and make elements circulate more conveniently and be allocated more efficiently. China will continue to promote high-quality cooperation in building the Belt and Road Initiative and strengthen innovative cooperation in areas such as intelligent manufacturing and digital economy. The third is to jointly build an open and inclusive industrial and supply chain. We will take a clear-cut stand against protectionism and various forms of "decoupling and chain breaking", and at the same time strive to promote the green and low-carbon transformation of industrial and supply chains. China will integrate more deeply into the global industrial and supply chain system and actively participate in international cooperation in the field of green development. The fourth is to jointly build a mutually beneficial and win-win industrial chain and supply chain. Promote the construction of a global industrial chain and supply chain system in which all countries participate extensively, complement each other's advantages, and share dividends. China will actively promote industrial and production capacity cooperation with other countries and drive developing countries to participate more deeply in the global value chain. It is hoped that entrepreneurs from all countries will play an active role in promoting the stable operation of global industrial and supply chains. China will provide more convenience and better guarantees for companies from all over the world to invest and operate in China.

;

;Subsequently, Li Qiang announced the opening of the first China International Supply Chain Promotion Expo.

;

;Indonesian President Joko, Uruguay President Lacalle, World Trade Organization Director General Iweala, United Nations Conference on Trade and Development Secretary-General Greenspan and others delivered video speeches at the opening ceremony.

;

;Before the opening ceremony, Li Qiang visited the CIIE exhibition hall and interacted with the heads of relevant companies.

;

;Yin Li and Wu Zhenglong participated in the above activities.

;; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 01版要闻 - 杭州积极推进科技创新体系建设（加快形成新质生产力）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_5-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

;How long does it take for a technical idea to go from germination to demonstration, technical research and practical application?

;

;In the future factory of Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co., Ltd. located in Hangzhou, a "fluorescent series 9 million capture unit" consisting of a high-definition camera, fill light, etc. has been put into mass production and is widely used in Urban traffic management. "It only took 3 months for this product to complete the entire process from idea creation to product implementation." Wang Jun, product director of the company's R&D center, said that high efficiency comes from mechanism innovation in the transformation of results.

;

;In December 2022, Dahua’s “Multiple Applications of Innovative Methods in Artificial Intelligence Camera Optical System Design” won the first prize in the China Innovation Method Competition. In response to the technical difficulties of smart transportation in low light pollution and dark environments, the technical research team asked whether this idea can be expanded and applied in practice?

;

;“The difficulty in connecting technological innovation with market demand is to break down the barriers between various process links.” Wang Jun introduced that in order to make technological research and development truly meet market demand, Dahua has formed an R&D system formation, including cities and The company has 2 solution departments, 2 product centers for software and hardware, and 5 research institutes including the Advanced Technology Research Institute and the Big Data Research Institute to connect all process links.

;

;“To actively create an innovative atmosphere, we have held an all-employee innovation competition for three consecutive years. Outstanding innovators will not only receive incentive bonuses and patent results, but also have the opportunity to transform their results and launch their products.” Senior Vice President of the company President Liu Ming said, "We invest about 10% of our revenue into innovative research and development every year, with R&D technicians accounting for more than 50%, and we have applied for more than 8,000 patents."

;

;Winning development opportunities through innovation, Hangzhou There are many companies like Dahua.

;

;Highlighting the forward-looking and strategic demand orientation, Hangzhou actively promotes the construction of a scientific and technological innovation system - driving industrial innovation with scientific and technological innovation, by creating a full chain of "basic research - technological innovation - achievement transformation and industrialization". Strive to create more original results and plant the soil for new productivity.

;

;"Xiaoxi, please take me into the elevator of the Engineering Building and down to the first floor." At West Lake University, a blindfolded experimenter was successfully guided by the electronic guide dog "Xiaoxi".

;

;This electronic guide dog, developed by the Machine Intelligence Laboratory of the School of Engineering of West Lake University, has been widely used in the venues of the Hangzhou Asian Games and Asian Paralympic Games. "Thanks to high-precision sensors and sensing and control algorithms, 'Xiaoxi' has advantages over other electronic guide dogs that lack intelligent design." Wang Donglin, head of the laboratory, said, "With the support of the school, we are actively debugging. Strive to achieve commercialization as soon as possible."

;

;Westlake University has established a special achievement transformation office, introduced a professional "technical broker" team, and established three major service platforms: comprehensive services, industrial empowerment and financial investment. This full-process service helps transform scientific and technological achievements and builds a bridge between scientific research and business, academia and the corporate world.

;

;Strengthening basic research and applied basic research, Hangzhou has laid a solid foundation and strategic support for accelerating the formation of new productive forces. Song Xinjian, a member of the Hangzhou Municipal Science and Technology Bureau’s party group and a second-level inspector, introduced that the city has accelerated the formation of a full-process and full-cycle service system for scientific and technological achievements, and built a university-wide innovation ecosystem by deepening and expanding strategic cooperation with universities in Hangzhou.

;

;In Hangzhou, 1 national laboratory and 2 large scientific facilities are under construction, as well as 18 national key laboratories, 7 Zhejiang provincial laboratories, 36 provincial-level new R&D institutions, and new experiments The room system has been formed.

;

;Technological innovation activates high-quality development momentum. At present, Hangzhou has established a "5+X" industrial policy system covering five major industrial ecosystems: intelligent Internet of Things, biomedicine, high-end equipment, new materials, and green energy. Future industries such as artificial intelligence, synthetic biology, and future networks are also accelerating their layout. .

; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 01版要闻 - 积蓄外贸新动能（今日谈）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_6-01.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

; "Orders have been scheduled for next year" "We are expanding a new factory and striving to double our production capacity"... In Xiamen, Fujian , many lithium battery companies are busy expanding production capacity, expanding markets, and rushing orders. The lithium battery industry's "energy storage and going overseas" has become a vivid reflection of my country's vast foreign trade development space and strong development resilience.

;

;Small battery life brings new energy. In recent years, from the "three old items" of foreign trade exports such as clothing, furniture, and home appliances to the "three new items" of electric passenger vehicles, lithium batteries, and solar cells characterized by high technology, high added value, and green and low carbon, my country's foreign trade structure continues to be optimized and upgraded, and new momentum for exports continues to accumulate. Taking Fujian as an example, the total exports of the "three new" commodities in the first three quarters of this year increased by 80% year-on-year, driving the province's overall export growth by 4.8 percentage points, demonstrating that my country's manufacturing industry is unswervingly promoting high-end and green industries. From raw materials to components, from technology research and development to product supply, the supply chain of related industries is more complete, the technology content is higher, and the market competitiveness of "Made in China" is stronger.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: “It is necessary to smoothen the domestic and international dual circulation, actively break through the blockages and connect the breakpoints, constantly innovate new ways and new measures to attract foreign investment, expand opening up, and build a two-way network with world cohesion. Open up the hub, promote the innovative development of foreign trade, and continuously consolidate and expand the international market." We will make efforts in multiple dimensions such as accelerating fiscal and taxation financial support, improving port clearance efficiency, and creating trade opportunities, smoothing the industrial and supply chains, and cultivating new growth points for foreign trade, so as to It will definitely promote the accelerated quality improvement and upgrading of my country's foreign trade and achieve high-quality development.

; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 02版要闻 - 深中通道主线贯通（经济新方位·重大工程一线）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_1-02.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On the Lingding Ocean, the deep channel is like a long dragon lying on the waves .
;Photo by Zhang Ke (People’s Vision)

;
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;Schematic diagram of the deep and middle channel.
;Photo courtesy of CCCC Second Harbor Engineering Company

;
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;The integrated immersed tube, floating and installation ship "Yihang Jin'an 1".
;Photo by Shen Zhong (People's Vision)

;
; ;

;In winter in Lingnan, the sky is clear and clear; On the Lingding Ocean, the mist is vast.

;

;A super-large cross-sea channel that integrates "bridges, islands, tunnels, and underwater interconnections" looks like a long dragon, cutting through the clouds and sea in an "S" shape, appearing and disappearing.

;

;This is a major national project - the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor. After the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge, it once again connects the east and west sides of the Pearl River Estuary, and will provide the key to the "A"-shaped main traffic skeleton of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. "One horizontal line". When it opens to traffic next year, the journey from Shenzhen to Zhongshan will be shortened from two hours to less than 30 minutes.

;

;On the morning of November 28, as the last truck of concrete was poured, the 24-kilometer-long main line of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel was fully connected. Across vast expanse of blue water, the "hands" stretched out from Qianhai, Shenzhen and Ma'an Island, Zhongshan, finally held together tightly after 7 years.

;

; ; "Langjian Luozi";

;

;;Two artificial islands connect bridges and tunnels to achieve rapid traffic conversion;

;< p>; Starting from Zhongshan Ma'an Island, the project nodes of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel from west to east include Zhongshan Bridge, Lingdingyang Bridge, West Artificial Island, Undersea Tunnel and East Artificial Island, and are connected to the Shenzhen section of the Guangzhou-Shenzhen Coastal Expressway under construction. .

;

;How can vehicles safely drive into the undersea tunnel from the Lingdingyang Bridge, which is dozens of meters away from the sea? The West Artificial Island, which is shaped like a kite and is pulled by the "kite string" of Lingdingyang Bridge, solves this problem.

;

;The construction of this "kite" started in December 2016. It is the first child of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel to fall in the Lingding Ocean. "The most important function of the West Artificial Island is the bridge-tunnel conversion." said Huang Qingfei, chief engineer of the Tunnel and Underground Engineering Department of the China Communications Construction Highway Planning and Design Institute. "Cars get off the bridge and drive through the West Artificial Island into the immersed tube tunnel under the sea. ."

;

;How long will it take to build an artificial island with an area of ​​about 137,000 square meters, equivalent to 19 standard football fields, in the vast sea? The answer is four and a half months.

;

;“57 steel cylinders with a diameter of 28 meters, a height of 35 meters to 40 meters, and a weight of more than 600 tons were sunk into the seabed, which is equivalent to forming an enclosure wall, and then filled with sand inside. The main structure construction on the island." Zheng Weitao, deputy chief engineer of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel Project Department of CCCC First Harbor Engineering Co., Ltd. said that because the West Artificial Island is located in the sand mining area and has complex strata, the steel cylinder cannot be vibrated smoothly using conventional equipment and technology. In place, the construction team independently developed a 12-hammer linkage hammer group, which vibrated at the same frequency to "knock" giant steel cylinders bit by bit into the seabed rock formations on the sea foundation, setting a record for rapid island construction.

;

;The immersed tube tunnel hidden into the seabed from the west artificial island emerges from the east artificial island located on the south side of Shenzhen Baoan Airport. This is also the gateway project at the Shenzhen end of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor. Previously, this was a shoal, and the island filled with sea sand covers an area of ​​343,800 square meters, equivalent to 48 standard football fields. This is the first underwater highway interchange in China. It adopts the "one body and two wings" layout. There are four ramp tunnels under water. One side is connected to the submarine immersed tube tunnel, and the other side is connected to the Guangzhou-Shenzhen Yanjiang Expressway and other road networks. Smooth connection.

;

;The problem lies in interconnection. "We are going to build an island under the Guangzhou-Shenzhen Yanjiang Expressway and fill in more than 3 million cubic meters of sea sand. The displacement and settlement of the piers of the Yanjiang Expressway caused by the island construction construction shall not exceed 5 millimeters." China Railway Tunnel Bureau Deep Middle Channel Project Dong Baohu, deputy director of the Ministry of Engineering, said that during the construction of the main line tunnel, the 18-meter-deep foundation pit excavated was only 1.17 meters away from the closest point to the existing bridge cap, which was "dangerous and dangerous, and prudent."

;

;Problem solving also relies on technological innovation. "In order to avoid excessive deviation of the existing bridge piers, we used ships to blow sea sand around the bridge piers. We first packed the sea sand into special bags, and then spread it evenly around the bridge piers layer by layer, solving the problem of deviation. load problem." Dong Baohu said that the construction team integrated CNC hydraulics, automated inspection and Internet of Things technologies, innovated process construction methods, and successively solved world-class common problems such as deep soft foundation, ultra-deep and ultra-wide foundation pit anti-seepage and water-proofing in the sea, and this year Construction of the main structure of the east artificial island was completed in June.

;

;Today, the two artificial islands have become new landmarks of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel. In the future, through the artificial island in the east, we can go east to Huizhou and Longgang District of Shenzhen, to the west to Zhongshan and Zhuhai, to the north to Guangzhou and Dongguan, and to the south to Shenzhen Qianhai and Hong Kong, making the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor truly a hub project of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. .

;

; ; "The Lead in the Wind";

;

;;30 stories above the sea, the super-long-span bridge broke multiple records;;

;Looking from afar, the Lingdingyang Bridge is majestic and erected on the main channel of Lingdingyang.

;

;The upstream of the bridge is Guangzhou Port, the largest container trunk port in South China. There are more than 130 international container routes, and an average of more than 4,000 ships sailing on the Lingding Ocean under the bridge deck every day. In the future, there will be more Meet the navigation needs of 300,000-ton bulk carriers and 30,000-TEU container ships.

;

;The busy navigation demand puts forward requirements for the clear navigation height of the bridge. To this end, the Lingdingyang Bridge adopts the world's largest fully offshore suspension bridge plan with a main span of 1,666 meters. The bridge deck is 91 meters above sea level, equivalent to a height of 30 stories, and the net navigation height reaches 76.5 meters. Chen Huanyong, engineer of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel Management Center of Guangdong Communications Group, said: "The clear navigation width of the main channel of Guangzhou Port is 1,520 meters. Taking into account the width of the main tower cap, anti-collision facilities, channel markings and other structures, we adopted a super-large span of 1,666 meters. Bridge."

;

;The waters of the Pearl River Estuary are open and strong typhoons occur frequently. How can such a high bridge withstand the wind?

;

;“We organized many universities and scientific research institutions to carry out wind resistance research for more than three years, and developed a new combined aerodynamic control technology to significantly improve the wind resistance performance of long-span steel box girder suspension bridges.” Chen Huanyong said that the new technology solution has increased the critical flutter wind speed of the long-span steel box girder suspension bridge from the world-recognized 70 meters/second to 88 meters/second, "which can withstand Category 17 typhoons."

;

;Looking from the bridge, the tall main tower looks like two gates, and the "door pillars" are firmly plunged into the seabed. Jin Wenliang, deputy director of the Chief Engineer Office of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor Management Center, said that the steel structure of the Lingdingyang Bridge uses about 85,000 tons of steel, which is equivalent to the amount of steel used in the two national stadiums "Bird's Nest". To lift such a heavy bridge, It is necessary to build two bridge piers that are tall enough and a main cable with sufficient pulling force.

;

;The two main towers are 270 meters high, equivalent to the height of a 90-story building. They are currently the tallest main towers of sea bridges in the world. The white main cable above the two main towers in the east and west has a diameter of 1.06 meters and is composed of more than 25,000 steel wires with a diameter of 6 mm. Each main cable has a cable force of more than 100,000 tons, which is equivalent to being able to withstand three medium-sized aircraft carriers at the same time. weight. "Each tiny steel wire can lift three cars." Jin Wenliang said that this is a 2060 MPa galvanized aluminum steel wire independently developed by my country. It is also the main cable steel wire of a suspension bridge with the highest strength level in China.

;

;;“Undersea Embroidery”;

;

;;“From 0 to 1”, build a 6.8-kilometer, two-way eight-lane undersea tunnel;< /p>;

;In the undersea tunnel that has just been completed, various construction vehicles are shuttled back and forth, and construction workers are "finishing decoration" in an orderly manner.

;

;In order to adapt to the technical characteristics of ultra-wide, widened, deeply buried, and large back-siltation of undersea tunnels, the construction team innovatively proposed a new structure of steel shell concrete immersed tube tunnel. This structure is the first large-scale application in the world, and China is facing a gap in the entire industry chain.

;

;Among this 6.8-kilometer-long, two-way eight-lane undersea tunnel, the 5,035-meter-long steel-shell concrete immersed tunnel has become the most difficult project in the deep-medium tunnel.

;

;“In 2018, we organized a team to go abroad to investigate and study the construction of immersed tube tunnels. The other party neither let us get close nor allowed us to take pictures. As a result, we learned nothing. But now we have created an overall level of It is far superior to the projects of international counterparts, and it is 100% independent intellectual property rights." Jin Wenliang sighed with emotion.

;

;“From 0 to 1”, start research and development. The Shenzhen-Zhongshan Tunnel Management Center organized a number of domestic universities, scientific research institutes, construction design units, etc. to carry out systematic research on the entire industry chain for the construction of immersed tube tunnels, and successively conquered steel shell manufacturing, self-compacting concrete preparation, pipe section pouring, and inspection In order to solve problems such as floating installation and installation, we developed an intelligent manufacturing production line, innovatively developed an integrated immersed tube floating installation ship, and revolutionized the floating installation process of giant pipe sections. The speed and accuracy of floating installation set a record.

;

;The immersed tube tunnel is composed of 32 pipe sections plus a final joint. It is sunk into the deep sea soft soil layer more than 30 meters below. Vehicles are equivalent to passing through the immersed tube. "Each standard pipe section is 165 meters long and weighs about 80,000 tons. It is very difficult to connect them end to end in deep water." Song Shenyou, director and chief engineer of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel Management Center, said that the installation of immersed pipes is equivalent to installing immersed pipes on the seabed. In needlework embroidery, "Once the positioning is inaccurate or the accuracy is insufficient, resulting in excessive deviation in the installation of pipe sections, the entire project will have to be suspended."

;

;How to make these big guys "obediently" "find" their place?

;

;In June 2020, the world's first immersed tube floating installation integrated ship "Yihang Jin'an 1" specially developed by the builder was officially launched. The 20,000-ton "Yihang Jin'an 1" carried an 80,000-ton immersed tube and advanced slowly. It sailed nearly 50 kilometers into the designated sea area and began millimeter-level precision installation. "We installed a Beidou satellite antenna on the measurement tower on the ship and used the Beidou navigation system to perform differential positioning of the immersed tube." said Ning Jinjin, executive deputy chief engineer of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel Project Department of CCCC First Harbor Engineering Co., Ltd.

;

;In order to create a "comfortable" foundation bed for the immersed tube, the construction company of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Tunnel developed an advanced immersed tube tunnel foundation trench gravel leveling ship "Yihang Jinping 2". "This boat is like an underwater '3D printer'. The flatness of the gravel layer can be controlled within plus or minus 4 centimeters." Ning Jinjin said.

;

;Right now, the builders of the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Corridor are sprinting towards completion and opening to traffic in 2024: construction projects such as the fire rescue base and operation management center have started, and the construction of mechanical and electrical and ancillary projects is in full swing. Lingdingyang The bridge deck paving work is also in full swing...

;

;(Zhu Jiahao participated in the interview)  

;

; 

;

;Format design: Wang Zheping

;; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 02版要闻 - 全面推进城市综合交通体系建设http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_2-02.htm
;Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

;This newspaper, Beijing, November 28th  (Reporter Ding Yiting) The Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development recently issued the "About Comprehensive "Guiding Opinions on Promoting the Construction of Urban Comprehensive Transportation Systems" (hereinafter referred to as the "Guiding Opinions") proposes that by 2025, the comprehensive urban transportation systems in various regions will be further improved, the facility network layout will be more complete, and operational efficiency, overall benefits, and intensification, intelligence, and The level of greening has been significantly improved; by 2035, all regions will have basically built a modern comprehensive urban transportation system that satisfies the people, is fully functional, efficient, smart, green, safe and resilient.

;

;In recent years, my country's urban comprehensive transportation system has made historic achievements, but there are still outstanding problems in overall planning, coordinated development, refined governance, service quality, etc., which are in line with the high-quality development of cities in the new development stage. The requirements are not met yet. The "Guiding Opinions" put forward relevant measures from the aspects of scientific preparation and implementation of comprehensive urban transportation system planning, promoting the systematic and coordinated development of urban transportation infrastructure, promoting the safe, green and intelligent development of urban transportation infrastructure, and strengthening organizational guarantees.

;

;The "Guiding Opinions" propose that the construction of urban rapid trunk transportation systems should be promoted in an orderly manner, the construction of urban daily distribution transportation systems should be actively implemented, and the construction of urban green slow-moving transportation systems should be accelerated. The daily distribution transportation system consists of urban primary and secondary trunk roads, branch roads, bus stations, logistics and distribution facilities, etc. It is the basic system for daily travel and transportation distribution. The "Guiding Opinions" propose to optimize the grading structure of the road network, improve the connectivity and accessibility of the road network, and achieve an average road network density of more than 8 kilometers per square kilometer in urban built-up areas.

;

;In terms of promoting the safe, green and intelligent development of urban transportation infrastructure, the "Guiding Opinions" proposes to implement intelligent transformation of urban transportation infrastructure. Promote "multiple poles in one, multiple boxes in one", build smart poles that integrate multiple devices and functions, and sense and collect dynamic and static traffic data. Promote the coordinated development of smart city infrastructure and intelligent connected vehicles, transform and upgrade roadside facilities, build smart roads that support diversified applications, and explore the construction of "holographic road networks" in key areas.

;

;Data show that by the end of 2022, 9,575.01 kilometers of rail transit have been built in cities across the country, a year-on-year increase of 11.71%; the national urban road area is 10.893 billion square meters, a year-on-year increase of 3.39%; the urban road length is 552,200 kilometers, a year-on-year increase An increase of 3.7%. The per capita road area in the city will be 19.28 square meters in 2022, an increase of 0.44 square meters over the previous year.

;; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 02版要闻 - 增强金融支持实体经济稳定性http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_3-02.htm
; Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

; Our newspaper Beijing, November 28. & nbsp; & nbsp; (Reporter Wu Qiuyu) According to the quarterly implementation report of China Monetary Policy, the monetary policy has been accurate and continued to provide more powerful support for the real economy since this year.

;

; The currency credit has maintained a reasonable growth. At the end of September, the balance of RMB loan reached 2.35 trillion yuan, and the existing currency (M2) and social financing scale increased by 10.3%and 9.0%year -on -year; from January to September, newly increased Renminbi loan was 1.975 trillion yuan, an increase of 1.58 trillion yuan year -on -year. The credit structure continues to be optimized. At the end of September, the balance of inclusive small and micro loans and manufacturing medium and long-term loans increased by 24.1% and 38.2% year-on-year respectively. Social financing costs have declined significantly. In September, the average interest rate of new corporate loans and personal housing loans was 3.82%and 4.02%, respectively, which were 0.18 and 0.32 percentage points lower than the same period last year. 0.73 percentage points. The exchange rate of the RMB against a basket of currencies remained stable and rose. At the end of September, it appreciated 2.9% compared with the end of June. Market expectations have stabilized.

;

; The report believes that the current economic maintenance of my country's economic maintenance is to be good, the growth momentum has continued to increase, and the transformation and upgrading continues to advance. The long -term fundamental fundamentals have not changed, and the toughness, potential, and vitality of development are continuously demonstrated. We must continue to work hard and multiply, and solidly promote the high -quality economic development.

; ; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 02版要闻 - 首批消费基础设施REITs项目获批http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_4-02.htm
; Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ;

; Our News Beijing, November 28. & nbsp; & nbsp; (Reporter Zhao Zhanhui) According to news, since the pilot scope of the real estate investment trust fund (REITs) in the infrastructure sector has expanded to the field of consumer infrastructure, the first batch of consumer infrastructure REITS projects have officially obtained the approval of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

;

; The three orders approved this time are the Huaxia Jinmao Shopping Center Rate, which will be listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, and the China Resources Business REIT, CICC India Consumer Consumer REIT, and underlying assets will be listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange. All shopping malls.

;

; In March of this year, the "Notice on Further Promoting the Normal Issuance Related Work of Reist Investment Trust Fund (REITs) in the infrastructure sector" issued by the China Securities Regulatory Commission proposes to research and support consumer capacity and improve consumer conditions, and improve consumer conditions. Innovate consumer infrastructure of consumer scenarios REITs. On October 20, the China Securities Regulatory Commission issued the "Decision on Modifying Article 50 of the" Guidelines for Public Raising Infrastructure Securities Investment Fund (Trial) "to expand the types of pilot assets of the public offering REITs to consumer infrastructure.

; ; Wed, 29 Nov 2023 05:56:32 +0800 02版要闻 - 动车开进阿坝藏族羌族自治州http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/29/nw.D110000renmrb_20231129_5-02.htm
; Wednesday, November 29, 2023
; ; ; ; ; ; ; ; ;
; ;
;

; The first trip from the Chuanqing Railway EMU from Mianzhu The city's Mianyuan River Bridge passed.
; Photo by Yuan Chengqi (People's Visual)

;
; ;

; Our newspaper Chengdu November 28th & nbsp ; & nbsp; (Reporters Li Xinping, Song Haoxin, Li Kaixuan) On the 28th, the Qingbaijiang Railway Qingbaijiang Railway, Qinghai from Sichuan to Qingbaijiang to Zhenjiang Pass to open operations. This is the first railway in the northwest of Sichuan. The history of the Aba Tibetan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture has never ended the railway.

;

; The Chuanqing Railway has started from Chengdu East Station and connected to Xining Station. The main line is about 836 kilometers long and the design speed is 200 kilometers per hour. It is a national -level double -line railway. Qingbaijiang East to Zhenjiang Guan section is 206 kilometers in length. After opening, Chengdu East Station to Sanxingdui and Zhenjiangguan Station can reach 18 points and 86 points, respectively. This line passes through tourist attractions such as Sanxingdui, ancient cities in China, and Munougou, which will provide strong support for the development of tourism and other industries along the line.

;

; The Qingbaijiang River in the Chuanqing Railway is in the Gaoshan Canyon area where the Chengdu Plain transitions to the east of the Qinghai -Tibet Plateau. The geological conditions along the line are complicated and the construction is difficult. The project started in 2011. The builder set up 33 bridges and built 10 tunnels to ensure that the project was completed as scheduled.
